verses.verse: Συνεργοῦντες <WG4903> Synergountes [God’s] fellow workers , ( Literally Now working together) ( Paul’s Hardships and God’s Grace) δὲ <WG1161> de [As] καὶ <WG2532> kai then , παρακαλοῦμεν <WG3870> parakaloumen we urge μὴ <WG3361> mē not εἰς <WG1519> eis in κενὸν <WG2756> kenon vain . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - χάριν <WG5485> charin grace τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God’s δέξασθαι <WG1209> dexasthai to receive ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you

λέγει <WG3004> legei He says : γάρ <WG1063> gar For Καιρῷ <WG2540> Kairō “ In the time δεκτῷ <WG1184> dektō of favor ἐπήκουσά <WG1873> epēkousa I heard σου <WG4771> sou you , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐν <WG1722> en in ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera [the] day σωτηρίας <WG4991> sōtērias of salvation ἐβοήθησά <WG997> eboēthēsa I helped σοι <WG4771> soi you .” ( (see also LXX)) Ἰδοὺ <WG2400> Idou Behold , νῦν <WG3568> nyn now καιρὸς <WG2540> kairos [is the] time εὐπρόσδεκτος <WG2144> euprosdektos of favor ; ἰδοὺ <WG2400> idou - νῦν <WG3568> nyn now ἡμέρα <WG2250> hēmera [is the] day σωτηρίας <WG4991> sōtērias of salvation !

Μηδεμίαν <WG3367> Mēdemian no ἐν <WG1722> en in μηδενὶ <WG3367> mēdeni [anyone’s] way , διδόντες <WG1325> didontes We put προσκοπήν <WG4349> proskopēn obstacle ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that μὴ <WG3361> mē no one μωμηθῇ <WG3469> mōmēthē can discredit ἡ <WG3588> hē [our] διακονία <WG1248> diakonia ministry .

ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ Rather , ἐν <WG1722> en in παντὶ <WG3956> panti every way : συνιστάνοντες <WG4921> synistanontes we commend ἑαυτοὺς <WG1438> heautous ourselves ὡς <WG5613> hōs as Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God διάκονοι <WG1249> diakonoi servants ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑπομονῇ <WG5281> hypomonē endurance ; πολλῇ <WG4183> pollē great ἐν <WG1722> en in θλίψεσιν <WG2347> thlipsesin troubles , ἐν <WG1722> en - ἀνάγκαις <WG318> anankais hardships , ἐν <WG1722> en [and] στενοχωρίαις <WG4730> stenochōriais calamities ;

ἐν <WG1722> en in πληγαῖς <WG4127> plēgais beatings , ἐν <WG1722> en - φυλακαῖς <WG5438> phylakais imprisonments , ἐν <WG1722> en - ἀκαταστασίαις <WG181> akatastasiais [and] riots ; ἐν <WG1722> en in κόποις <WG2873> kopois labor , ἐν <WG1722> en - ἀγρυπνίαις <WG70> agrypniais sleepless nights , ἐν <WG1722> en - νηστείαις <WG3521> nēsteiais [and] hunger ;

ἐν <WG1722> en in ἁγνότητι <WG54> hagnotēti purity , ἐν <WG1722> en - γνώσει <WG1108> gnōsei knowledge , ἐν <WG1722> en - μακροθυμίᾳ <WG3115> makrothymia patience , ἐν <WG1722> en [and] χρηστότητι <WG5544> chrēstotēti kindness ; ἐν <WG1722> en in Πνεύματι <WG4151> Pneumati Spirit Ἁγίῳ <WG40> Hagiō [the] Holy ἐν <WG1722> en [and] in ἀγάπῃ <WG26> agapē love ; ἀνυποκρίτῳ <WG505> anypokritō sincere

ἐν <WG1722> en in λόγῳ <WG3056> logō speech ἀληθείας <WG225> alētheias truthful ἐν <WG1722> en [and] in δυνάμει <WG1411> dynamei [the] power Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God ; διὰ <WG1223> dia with τῶν <WG3588> tōn the ὅπλων <WG3696> hoplōn weapons τῆς <WG3588> tēs - δικαιοσύνης <WG1343> dikaiosynēs of righteousness τῶν <WG3588> tōn in the δεξιῶν <WG1188> dexiōn right hand καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀριστερῶν <WG710> aristerōn in [the] left ;

διὰ <WG1223> dia through δόξης <WG1391> doxēs glory καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀτιμίας <WG819> atimias dishonor , διὰ <WG1223> dia - δυσφημίας <WG1426> dysphēmias slander καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐφημίας <WG2162> euphēmias praise ; ὡς <WG5613> hōs viewed as πλάνοι <WG4108> planoi imposters , καὶ <WG2532> kai yet ἀληθεῖς <WG227> alētheis genuine ;

ὡς <WG5613> hōs as ἀγνοούμενοι <WG50> agnooumenoi unknown , καὶ <WG2532> kai yet ἐπιγινωσκόμενοι <WG1921> epiginōskomenoi well-known ; ὡς <WG5613> hōs - ἀποθνήσκοντες <WG599> apothnēskontes dying , καὶ <WG2532> kai and yet ἰδοὺ <WG2400> idou - ζῶμεν <WG2198> zōmen we live on ; ὡς <WG5613> hōs - παιδευόμενοι <WG3811> paideuomenoi punished , καὶ <WG2532> kai yet μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv θανατούμενοι <WG2289> thanatoumenoi not killed ;

ὡς <WG5613> hōs - λυπούμενοι <WG3076> lypoumenoi sorrowful , ἀεὶ <WG104> aei always δὲ <WG1161> de yet χαίροντες <WG5463> chairontes rejoicing ; ὡς <WG5613> hōs - πτωχοὶ <WG4434> ptōchoi poor , πολλοὺς <WG4183> pollous making many δὲ <WG1161> de yet πλουτίζοντες <WG4148> ploutizontes rich ; ὡς <WG5613> hōs - μηδὲν <WG3367> mēden nothing , ἔχοντες <WG2192> echontes having καὶ <WG2532> kai and yet πάντα <WG3956> panta everything . κατέχοντες <WG2722> katechontes possessing

Τὸ <WG3588> To - στόμα <WG4750> stoma vvv ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn We ἀνέῳγεν <WG455> aneōgen have spoken freely πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you , Κορίνθιοι <WG2881> Korinthioi Corinthians . ἡ <WG3588> hē - καρδία <WG2588> kardia hearts ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn Our πεπλάτυνται <WG4115> peplatyntai are open wide .

οὐ <WG3756> ou not στενοχωρεῖσθε <WG4729> stenochōreisthe - ἐν <WG1722> en vvv ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin our στενοχωρεῖσθε <WG4729> stenochōreisthe that is restrained . δὲ <WG1161> de [It is] ἐν <WG1722> en [but] τοῖς <WG3588> tois - σπλάγχνοις <WG4698> splanchnois affection , ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn yours ,

τὴν <WG3588> tēn - δὲ <WG1161> de [As] αὐτὴν <WG846> autēn a fair ἀντιμισθίαν <WG489> antimisthian exchange , ὡς <WG5613> hōs as τέκνοις <WG5043> teknois [my] children : λέγω <WG3004> legō I ask [you] πλατύνθητε <WG4115> platynthēte Open wide καὶ <WG2532> kai also . ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis your [hearts]

( Do Not Be Unequally Yoked) Μὴ <WG3361> Mē Do not γίνεσθε <WG1096> ginesthe be ἑτεροζυγοῦντες <WG2086> heterozygountes unequally yoked ἀπίστοις <WG571> apistois with unbelievers . τίς <WG5101> tis what γὰρ <WG1063> gar For μετοχὴ <WG3352> metochē partnership [can] δικαιοσύνῃ <WG1343> dikaiosynē righteousness καὶ <WG2532> kai [have with] ἀνομίᾳ <WG458> anomia wickedness ? ἢ <WG2228> ē Or τίς <WG5101> tis what κοινωνία <WG2842> koinōnia fellowship φωτὶ <WG5457> phōti [does] light [have] πρὸς <WG4314> pros with σκότος <WG4655> skotos darkness ?

τίς <WG5101> tis What δὲ <WG1161> de - συμφώνησις <WG4857> symphōnēsis harmony Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou [is there between] Christ πρὸς <WG4314> pros and Βελιάρ <WG955> Beliar Belial ? ( Scrivener’s TR and GOC; many Greek sources Beliar) ἢ <WG2228> ē Or τίς <WG5101> tis what μερὶς <WG3310> meris have in common πιστῷ <WG4103> pistō does a believer μετὰ <WG3326> meta with ἀπίστου <WG571> apistou an unbeliever ?

τίς <WG5101> tis What δὲ <WG1161> de - συνκατάθεσις <WG4783> synkatathesis agreement ναῷ <WG3485> naō the temple Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God μετὰ <WG3326> meta [can exist] between εἰδώλων <WG1497> eidōlōn [and] idols ? ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis we γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ναὸς <WG3485> naos [the] temple Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God . ἐσμεν <WG1510> esmen are ζῶντος <WG2198> zōntos of [the] living καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs As εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen has said : ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - Ἐνοικήσω <WG1774> Enoikēsō “ I will dwell ἐν <WG1722> en with αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐμπεριπατήσω* <WG1704> emperipatēsō walk among [them] , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔσομαι <WG1510> esomai I will be αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their Θεός <WG2316> Theos God , καὶ <WG2532> kai and αὐτοὶ <WG846> autoi they ἔσονταί <WG1510> esontai will be μου <WG1473> mou My λαός <WG2992> laos people .” ( ; ; )

Διὸ <WG1352> Dio “ Therefore ἐξέλθατε <WG1831> exelthate come out ἐκ <WG1537> ek from μέσου <WG3319> mesou . . . αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn among them καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀφορίσθητε <WG873> aphoristhēte be separate , λέγει <WG3004> legei says Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios [the] Lord . καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἀκαθάρτου <WG169> akathartou unclean thing , μὴ <WG3361> mē no ἅπτεσθε <WG680> haptesthe Touch κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō and I εἰσδέξομαι <WG1523> eisdexomai will receive ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you .” ( ; see also , including LXX.)

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And : Ἔσομαι <WG1510> Esomai “ I will be ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you , εἰς <WG1519> eis - Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera a Father καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ἔσεσθέ <WG1510> esesthe will be μοι <WG1473> moi My εἰς <WG1519> eis - υἱοὺς <WG5207> huious sons καὶ <WG2532> kai and θυγατέρας <WG2364> thygateras daughters , λέγει <WG3004> legei says Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios [the] Lord Παντοκράτωρ <WG3841> Pantokratōr Almighty . ” ( See .)
